card_text: 1 "Genex" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters$NThis card's effects depend on the Attribute(s) of its non-Tuner Synchro Material Monsters.$N●EARTH: If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.$N●FIRE: If this card destroys a monster by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.$N●LIGHT: Once per turn, you can select 1 LIGHT monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position.
